alert.note: Alert for Anoka; Hennepin; Isanti; Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hennepin, southeastern Wright, northwestern Anoka, southwestern Isanti and southeastern Sherburne Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elk River, or 17 miles northeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elk River and St. Francis around 425 PM CDT. Otsego around 440 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rogers, Andover, Ramsey, Maple Grove, Champlin, Corcoran and Anoka. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 194 and 205. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 203 and 217. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 135 and 140. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 159 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.
